name: Corridor Finance
description: Corridor Finance enhances BRC20 token functionality through DeFi solutions like swaps, bridges, and farming, providing increased liquidity and utilities for token holders. Key features include a Bitcoin cross-chain bridge to EVM & BTC L2, BRC20 AMM swaps, DeFi farming, and incentives for BRC20 programs. Highlights include cross-chain compatibility, mainnet readiness, zero gas swaps, DeFi utilities, cross-protocol swaps, and incentives for BRC20 projects.
